subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Jeff Overton shot a five-under-par 67 to take the first-round lead at the Turning Stone Resort Championship, the second stop on the P.G.A. Tour’s Fall Series, in Verona, N.Y. Overton made three birdies on his back nine to take a one-shot lead over Michael Allen and Steve Allan.
